thread.title: Younis Khan eclipses Javed Miandad to become Pakistan's highest Test run-scorer
thread.title_full: Younis Khan eclipses Javed Miandad to become Pakistan's highest Test run-scorer - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Younis Khan eclipses Javed Miandad to become Pakistan's highest Test run-scorer
text:
*Abu Dhabi:* Veteran batsman Younis Khan on Tuesday became Pakistan 's all-time leading Test run-scorer, surpassing Javed Miandad's tally of 8832 runs on the opening day of the first Test against England in Abu Dhabi.
Playing his 102nd Test, Younis, 37, hit off-spinner Moeen Ali for a huge six to cross Miandad and ... Â»
